author: serge
msg: Added a few more FAQs about the  state of IMAP support and virtual hosting, and then some quick tips on classpath issues.

author: serge
msg: Patch from Jeff Keyser <JKeyser@telocity.com>.  Changes the bounce to check for a return-path header, and if there is one, have it go to that address instead of however JavaMail is figuring out who to send it to.  Should probably be fixed in JavaMail, but who cares, eh?

author: hbedi
msg: nntp test was using Sun's internal classes. Renamed the file to avoid build failure with JDK 1.4

author: serge
msg: Wrapped quotes around the PHOENIX_HOME parameters so if you install to a path with spaces, James should still work.

author: serge
msg: Corrected behavior in null sender situation... matcher should not match this kind of message.
